you have a whole bunch of frequent flyer

loyalty program the problem is is that
you have to take the time to find every
single one of these things and write
down the number and write down the
username and write down the password and
then put them in a single piece of
software that will track it all for you
automatically without you having to
collect or gather any cards anymore the
best part about having all this kind of
sorted in one place is that you know
when it comes time to take a trip you
know where you have freebies ready and

more quickly most of us have at least

herein lies the danger of fiscal health
day especially at a higher priced
emporium like Barney's if you spend less
than the full amount on your card you
feel like a rube the store has gotten
the better of you and kept some of your
money but to spend all of the money on
the card you probably have to spend a
bit more than what's on it which means
the store has gotten the better of you
indeed I spent an extra 12 dollars or so
in order to afford just two pairs of
fancy socks at Barneys but they sure
look pretty
now you may not be able to spend eight
straight hours on fiscal health day
activities just because you have to work
but if you can spend an hour a day over
the course of a week say you will have
